mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, b.repairman, b.tdate, b.explain, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, d.client_code AS code FROM b_client_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_client_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_client_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS c ON a.c_client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN c_client AS d ON c.c_client_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE b_client_repair AS a SET a.register =#{register}, a.repairman =#{repairman}, a.tdate =#{tdate}, a.result =#{result}, a.explain =#{explain} WHERE a.b_client_fault_id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into b_client_repair ( b_client_fault_id, register, repairman, tdate, result, b_client_repair.`explain` ) values ( #{id}, #{register}, #{repairman}, #{tdate}, #{result}, #{explain} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.c_gateway_id, a.fault_no, a.c_gateway_new_id, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, e.NAME AS register_name, b.repairman, b.tdate, b.operate as `explain`, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, d.gateway_code AS code FROM b_gateway_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_gateway_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_gateway_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 AS c ON a.c_gateway_id = c.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway AS d ON c.c_gateway_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS e ON b.register = e.USER_ID WHERE a.id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into b_gateway_repair ( b_gateway_fault_id, register, repairman, tdate, operate ) values ( #{id}, #{register}, #{repairman}, #{tdate}, #{operate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.c_gateway_id AS id, a.name, a.location, a.comment, a.staus AS status, count(c.c_client_id) as number, b.gateway_code AS code FROM c_gateway_attr1 AS a LEFT JOIN c_gateway AS b ON a.c_gateway_id = b.id LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway AS c ON a.c_gateway_id = c.c_gateway_id
WHERE a.c_gateway_type_id = 3
AND c.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}), '%')
AND b.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}), '%')
group by c.c_gateway_id

SELECT a.id, b.`name`, c.client_code AS number, b.staus AS status, b.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber ,b.`comment` FROM v_gateway_client AS a LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS b ON a.id = b.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client AS c ON a.id = c.id LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway AS d ON a.id = d.c_client_id WHERE 1=1
AND c.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}
AND b.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}), '%')
AND c.client_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}), '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_client_gateway(c_client_id, c_gateway_id, type) VALUES(#{client}, #{gateway}, #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT a.c_gateway_id, b.gateway_code, a.name, a.location, c.name_EN, c.name_CH FROM c_gateway_attr1 a INNER JOIN c_gateway AS b ON a.c_gateway_id = b.id INNER JOIN c_gateway_upload_status d on b.id = d.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_type c on a.c_gateway_type_id = c.id WHERE a.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids} AND a.RLstatus = '2' AND d.status = '1' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM c_client_gateway f where a.c_gateway_id = f.c_gateway_id)

SELECT b.id, b.client_code, b.coordinate, b.node, b.type FROM c_client_gateway a INNER JOIN c_client_copy b ON a.c_client_id = b.id WHERE a.type = 1 AND a.c_gateway_id = #{oldGatewayid} UNION SELECT c.id, c.client_code, c.coordinate, c.node, c.type FROM c_client_gateway a INNER JOIN c_sensor_copy c ON a.c_client_id = c.id WHERE a.type = 3 AND a.c_gateway_id = #{oldGatewayid}

SELECT concat_ws('.',c.node,c.node2) node FROM c_gateway_term a INNER JOIN c_client_term2 b ON a.id = b.c_gateway_term_id INNER JOIN c_client_attr1 c on b.c_client_id = c.c_client_id WHERE a.c_gateway_id = #{oldGatewayid}
SELECT b.cmd FROM b_gateway_strategy a INNER JOIN b_gateway_strategy_cmd b ON a.id = b.b_gateway_strategy_id WHERE a.c_gateway_id = #{oldGatewayid}
SELECT id, c_term_id, c_gateway_id, c_gateway_team_id FROM c_gateway_term WHERE c_gateway_id = #{oldGatewayid}
SELECT id, c_gateway_id, fault_no, c_gateway_new_id, type, comment, status FROM b_gateway_fault WHERE id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select register, repairman, operate, tdate FROM b_gateway_repair WHERE b_gateway_fault_id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
